post_title: Sold: The T206 Collection: The Players and Their Stories
post_content:
-
The T206 Bible and a fun read.  I have an extra copy so better to put it in another members hands for enjoyment.  

$20 pp/ff plus shipping of $7.00.  PM with any questions and thanks for looking.

Great price. GLWS

Would buy if I didn’t already have a copy
Hi - I'll take this if still available.  PM incoming.
Great book. My wife just had this painting done and included the book!
Great book and price. Highly recommended.
